title: twilight font id
content:
i'm in a bind here on a rush job. i need to know the supporting serif used in the twilight materials here. i understand the twighlight title is set in p22's zephyr however i can't place the other type (saga, new moon etcâ€¦) . i'd look myself, but i'm already under the gun and need to start the layout. any help is very much appreciated. thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110121063842im_/http:/typophile.com/files/twilight_4221.jpg)
author: johndiggity

comments.content:
This is the kind of ID request we like. Good work.

- Mike Yanega
